text: Duplicaria tristis is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Terebridae, the auger snails.MolluscaBase eds. (2020). MolluscaBase. Duplicaria tristis (Deshayes, 1859). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at: http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=447304 on 2020-01-27 ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== * Hutton, F. W.
